item.title: Distintos canales para distintos servicios: Fuentes de Información en Servicios de Búsqueda, Experiencia y Creencia
Mobile and traditional videogames
item.description: In this ongoing project, in which a doctoral thesis is being developed, we analyze the relationship and the differences between the consumption of video games on mobile platforms and traditional platforms.

item.title: The Impact of Market Environments on Marketing Relationships
